long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension manager chrome://extensions/, main extension name, extension list, delete extension, edit

Here's how to access and use the Chrome extension manager:

Open Google Chrome: Launch the Google Chrome web browser on your computer.

Click on the three vertical dots in the top-right corner of the Chrome window to open the menu.
Hover your mouse over "Chrome Extension Manager logos" in the menu that appears.

View and Manage Extensions:

In the "Extensions" tab, you will see a list of all the extensions you have installed.
You can enable or disable an extension by toggling the switch next to its name. Disabling an extension temporarily turns it off without uninstalling it.
To remove an extension, click the "Remove" button under the extension you want to uninstall.
long.hi:
क्रोम एक्सटेंशन मैनेजर क्रोम://एक्सटेंशन/, मुख्य एक्सटेंशन नाम, एक्सटेंशन सूची, एक्सटेंशन हटाएं, संपादित करें

Chrome एक्सटेंशन प्रबंधक तक पहुंचने और उसका उपयोग करने का तरीका यहां बताया गया है:

Google Chrome खोलें: अपने कंप्यूटर पर Google Chrome वेब ब्राउज़र लॉन्च करें।

मेनू खोलने के लिए क्रोम विंडो के ऊपरी-दाएँ कोने में तीन लंबवत बिंदुओं पर क्लिक करें।
दिखाई देने वाले मेनू में अपने माउस को "क्रोम एक्सटेंशन मैनेजर लोगो" पर होवर करें।

एक्सटेंशन देखें और प्रबंधित करें:

"एक्सटेंशन" टैब में, आपको अपने द्वारा इंस्टॉल किए गए सभी एक्सटेंशन की एक सूची दिखाई देगी।
आप किसी एक्सटेंशन के नाम के आगे स्थित स्विच को टॉगल करके उसे सक्षम या अक्षम कर सकते हैं। किसी एक्सटेंशन को अक्षम करने से उसे अनइंस्टॉल किए बिना अस्थायी रूप से बंद कर दिया जाता है।
किसी एक्सटेंशन को हटाने के लिए, उस एक्सटेंशन के नीचे "निकालें" बटन पर क्लिक करें जिसे आप अनइंस्टॉल करना चाहते हैं।

krom eksatenshan mainejar krom://eksatenshan/, mukhy eksatenshan naam, eksatenshan soochee, eksatenshan hataen, sampaadit karen

chhromai eksatenshan prabandhak tak pahunchane aur usaka upayog karane ka tareeka yahaan bataaya gaya hai:

googlai chhromai kholen: apane kampyootar par googlai chhromai veb brauzar lonch karen.

menoo kholane ke lie krom vindo ke ooparee-daen kone mein teen lambavat binduon par klik karen.
dikhaee dene vaale menoo mein apane maus ko "krom eksatenshan mainejar logo" par hovar karen.

eksatenshan dekhen aur prabandhit karen:

"eksatenshan" taib mein, aapako apane dvaara instol kie gae sabhee eksatenshan kee ek soochee dikhaee degee.
aap kisee eksatenshan ke naam ke aage sthit svich ko togal karake use saksham ya aksham kar sakate hain. kisee eksatenshan ko aksham karane se use aninstol kie bina asthaayee roop se band kar diya jaata hai.
kisee eksatenshan ko hataane ke lie, us eksatenshan ke neeche "nikaalen" batan par klik karen jise aap aninstol karana chaahate hain.

Chrome extension manager chrome://extensions/, main extension name, extension list, delete extension, edit

Here's how to access and use the Chrome extension manager:

Open Google Chrome: Launch the Google Chrome web browser on your computer.

Click on the three vertical dots in the top-right corner of the Chrome window to open the menu.
Hover your mouse over "Chrome Extension Manager logos" in the menu that appears.

View and Manage Extensions:

In the "Extensions" tab, you will see a list of all the extensions you have installed.
You can enable or disable an extension by toggling the switch next to its name. Disabling an extension temporarily turns it off without uninstalling it.
To remove an extension, click the "Remove" button under the extension you want to uninstall.
long.id:
Manajer ekstensi Chrome chrome://extensions/, nama ekstensi utama, daftar ekstensi, hapus ekstensi, edit

Berikut cara mengakses dan menggunakan pengelola ekstensi Chrome:

Buka Google Chrome: Luncurkan browser web Google Chrome di komputer Anda.

Klik pada tiga titik vertikal di sudut kanan atas jendela Chrome untuk membuka menu.
Arahkan mouse Anda ke "Logo Manajer Ekstensi Chrome" di menu yang muncul.

Lihat dan Kelola Ekstensi:

Di tab "Ekstensi", Anda akan melihat daftar semua ekstensi yang telah Anda instal.
Anda dapat mengaktifkan atau menonaktifkan ekstensi dengan mengalihkan tombol di sebelah namanya. Menonaktifkan ekstensi untuk sementara akan menonaktifkannya tanpa mencopot pemasangannya.
Untuk menghapus ekstensi, klik tombol "Hapus" di bawah ekstensi yang ingin Anda copot pemasangannya.

Chrome extension manager chrome://extensions/, main extension name, extension list, delete extension, edit

Here's how to access and use the Chrome extension manager:

Open Google Chrome: Launch the Google Chrome web browser on your computer.

Click on the three vertical dots in the top-right corner of the Chrome window to open the menu.
Hover your mouse over "Chrome Extension Manager logos" in the menu that appears.

View and Manage Extensions:

In the "Extensions" tab, you will see a list of all the extensions you have installed.
You can enable or disable an extension by toggling the switch next to its name. Disabling an extension temporarily turns it off without uninstalling it.
To remove an extension, click the "Remove" button under the extension you want to uninstall.
long.ja:
Chrome 拡張機能マネージャー chrome://extensions/、メイン拡張機能名、拡張機能リスト、拡張機能の削除、編集

Chrome 拡張機能マネージャーにアクセスして使用する方法は次のとおりです。

Google Chrome を開く: コンピュータで Google Chrome Web ブラウザを起動します。

Chrome ウィンドウの右上隅にある 3 つの縦の点をクリックしてメニューを開きます。
表示されるメニューの「Chrome Extension Manager ロゴ」にマウスを置きます。

拡張機能の表示と管理:

「拡張機能」タブには、インストールしたすべての拡張機能のリストが表示されます。
拡張機能名の横にあるスイッチを切り替えることで、拡張機能を有効または無効にできます。 拡張機能を無効にすると、アンインストールせずに一時的に無効になります。
拡張機能を削除するには、アンインストールする拡張機能の下にある「削除」ボタンをクリックします。


Kurōmu kakuchō kinō manējā chrome: / / Extensions/, mein kakuchō kinō-mei, kakuchō kinō risuto, kakuchō kinō no sakujo, henshū kurōmu kakuchō kinō manējā ni akusesu shite shiyō suru hōhō wa tsugi no tōridesu. Gūgurukurōmu o hiraku: Konpyūta de gūgurukurōmu u~ebu burauza o kidō shimasu. Kurōmu u~indō no migiuwasumi ni aru 3-tsu no tate no ten o kurikku shite menyū o hirakimasu. Hyōji sa reru menyū no `kurōmu Extension manējā rogo' ni mausu o okimasu. Kakuchō kinō no hyōji to kanri: `Kakuchō kinō' tabu ni wa, insutōru shita subete no kakuchō kinō no risuto ga hyōji sa remasu. Kakuchō kinō-mei no yoko ni aru suitchi o kirikaeru koto de, kakuchō kinō o yūkō matawa mukō ni dekimasu. Kakuchō kinō o mukōnisuru to, an'insutōru sezu ni ichijitekini mukō ni narimasu. Kakuchō kinō o sakujo suru ni wa, an'insutōru suru kakuchō kinō no shita ni aru `sakujo' botan o kurikku shimasu.


Chrome extension manager chrome://extensions/, main extension name, extension list, delete extension, edit

Here's how to access and use the Chrome extension manager:

Open Google Chrome: Launch the Google Chrome web browser on your computer.

Click on the three vertical dots in the top-right corner of the Chrome window to open the menu.
Hover your mouse over "Chrome Extension Manager logos" in the menu that appears.

View and Manage Extensions:

In the "Extensions" tab, you will see a list of all the extensions you have installed.
You can enable or disable an extension by toggling the switch next to its name. Disabling an extension temporarily turns it off without uninstalling it.
To remove an extension, click the "Remove" button under the extension you want to uninstall.
long.pt_BR,pt_PT:
Gerenciador de extensões do Chrome chrome://extensions/, nome da extensão principal, lista de extensões, excluir extensão, editar

Veja como acessar e usar o gerenciador de extensões do Chrome:

Abra o Google Chrome: inicie o navegador Google Chrome em seu computador.

Clique nos três pontos verticais no canto superior direito da janela do Chrome para abrir o menu.
Passe o mouse sobre “Logotipos do Chrome Extension Manager” no menu que aparece.

Visualizar e gerenciar extensões:

Na guia "Extensões", você verá uma lista de todas as extensões instaladas.
Você pode ativar ou desativar uma extensão alternando a chave ao lado de seu nome. Desativar uma extensão a desativa temporariamente sem desinstalá-la.
Para remover uma extensão, clique no botão “Remover” abaixo da extensão que deseja desinstalar.

Chrome extension manager chrome://extensions/, main extension name, extension list, delete extension, edit

Here's how to access and use the Chrome extension manager:

Open Google Chrome: Launch the Google Chrome web browser on your computer.

Click on the three vertical dots in the top-right corner of the Chrome window to open the menu.
Hover your mouse over "Chrome Extension Manager logos" in the menu that appears.

View and Manage Extensions:

In the "Extensions" tab, you will see a list of all the extensions you have installed.
You can enable or disable an extension by toggling the switch next to its name. Disabling an extension temporarily turns it off without uninstalling it.
To remove an extension, click the "Remove" button under the extension you want to uninstall.
long.vi:
Trình quản lý tiện ích mở rộng của Chrome chrome://extensions/, tên tiện ích mở rộng chính, danh sách tiện ích mở rộng, xóa tiện ích mở rộng, chỉnh sửa

Dưới đây là cách truy cập và sử dụng trình quản lý tiện ích mở rộng của Chrome:

Mở Google Chrome: Khởi chạy trình duyệt web Google Chrome trên máy tính của bạn.

Nhấp vào ba dấu chấm dọc ở góc trên bên phải của cửa sổ Chrome để mở menu.
Di chuột qua "Biểu trưng Trình quản lý tiện ích mở rộng của Chrome" trong menu xuất hiện.

Xem và quản lý tiện ích mở rộng:

Trong tab "Tiện ích mở rộng", bạn sẽ thấy danh sách tất cả các tiện ích mở rộng bạn đã cài đặt.
Bạn có thể bật hoặc tắt tiện ích mở rộng bằng cách chuyển đổi nút gạt bên cạnh tên của tiện ích mở rộng đó. Vô hiệu hóa tiện ích mở rộng sẽ tạm thời tắt tiện ích đó mà không cần gỡ cài đặt.
Để xóa tiện ích mở rộng, hãy nhấp vào nút "Xóa" bên dưới tiện ích mở rộng bạn muốn gỡ cài đặt.

Chrome extension manager chrome://extensions/, main extension name, extension list, delete extension, edit

Here's how to access and use the Chrome extension manager:

Open Google Chrome: Launch the Google Chrome web browser on your computer.

Click on the three vertical dots in the top-right corner of the Chrome window to open the menu.
Hover your mouse over "Chrome Extension Manager logos" in the menu that appears.

View and Manage Extensions:

In the "Extensions" tab, you will see a list of all the extensions you have installed.
You can enable or disable an extension by toggling the switch next to its name. Disabling an extension temporarily turns it off without uninstalling it.
To remove an extension, click the "Remove" button under the extension you want to uninstall.
long.zh_CN:
Chrome扩展管理器 chrome://extensions/、主扩展名称、扩展列表、删除扩展、编辑

以下是访问和使用 Chrome 扩展程序管理器的方法：

打开 Google Chrome：在计算机上启动 Google Chrome 网络浏览器。

单击 Chrome 窗口右上角的三个垂直点以打开菜单。
将鼠标悬停在出现的菜单中的“Chrome 扩展管理器徽标”上。

查看和管理扩展：

在“扩展”选项卡中，您将看到已安装的所有扩展的列表。
您可以通过切换扩展名旁边的开关来启用或禁用扩展。 暂时禁用扩展会将其关闭而不卸载它。
要删除扩展程序，请单击要卸载的扩展程序下方的“删除”按钮。


Chrome kuòzhǎn guǎnlǐ qì chrome://Extensions/, zhǔ kuòzhǎn míngchēng, kuòzhǎn lièbiǎo, shānchú kuòzhǎn, biānjí

yǐxià shì fǎngwèn hé shǐyòng Chrome kuòzhǎn chéngxù guǎnlǐ qì de fāngfǎ:

Dǎkāi Google Chrome: Zài jìsuànjī shàng qǐdòng Google Chrome wǎngluò liúlǎn qì.

Dān jī Chrome chuāngkǒu yòushàng jiǎo de sān gè chuízhí diǎn yǐ dǎkāi càidān.
Jiāng shǔbiāo xuán tíng zài chūxiàn de càidān zhōng de “Chrome kuòzhǎn guǎnlǐ qì huībiāo” shàng.

Chákàn hé guǎnlǐ kuòzhǎn:

Zài “kuòzhǎn” xuǎnxiàng kǎ zhōng, nín jiāng kàn dào yǐ ānzhuāng de suǒyǒu kuòzhǎn dì lièbiǎo.
Nín kěyǐ tōngguò qiēhuàn kuòzhǎn míng pángbiān de kāiguān lái qǐyòng huò jìnyòng kuòzhǎn. Zhànshí jìnyòng kuòzhǎn huì jiāng qí guānbì ér bù xièzài tā.
Yào shānchú kuòzhǎn chéngxù, qǐng dān jī yào xièzài de kuòzhǎn chéngxù xiàfāng de “shānchú” ànniǔ.


Chrome extension manager chrome://extensions/, main extension name, extension list, delete extension, edit

Here's how to access and use the Chrome extension manager:

Open Google Chrome: Launch the Google Chrome web browser on your computer.

Click on the three vertical dots in the top-right corner of the Chrome window to open the menu.
Hover your mouse over "Chrome Extension Manager logos" in the menu that appears.

View and Manage Extensions:

In the "Extensions" tab, you will see a list of all the extensions you have installed.
You can enable or disable an extension by toggling the switch next to its name. Disabling an extension temporarily turns it off without uninstalling it.
To remove an extension, click the "Remove" button under the extension you want to uninstall.
long.zh_TW:
Chrome擴充功能管理器 chrome://extensions/、主擴充名稱、擴充功能清單、刪除擴充功能、編輯

以下是存取和使用 Chrome 擴充功能管理員的方法：

開啟 Google Chrome：在電腦上啟動 Google Chrome 網路瀏覽器。

點擊 Chrome 視窗右上角的三個垂直點以開啟選單。
將滑鼠懸停在出現的選單中的“Chrome 擴充管理器標誌”上。

查看和管理擴充功能：

在「擴充功能」標籤中，您將看到已安裝的所有擴充功能的清單。
您可以透過切換副檔名旁邊的開關來啟用或停用擴充功能。 暫時停用擴充會將其關閉而不卸載它。
若要刪除擴充程序，請按一下要解除安裝的擴充功能下方的「刪除」按鈕。


Chrome kuòchōng gōngnéng guǎnlǐ qì chrome://Extensions/, zhǔ kuòchōng míngchēng, kuòchōng gōngnéng qīngdān, shānchú kuòchōng gōngnéng, biānjí

yǐxià shì cún qǔ hé shǐyòng Chrome kuòchōng gōngnéng guǎnlǐ yuán de fāngfǎ:

Kāiqǐ Google Chrome: Zài diànnǎo shàng qǐdòng Google Chrome wǎng lù liúlǎn qì.

Diǎnjī Chrome shìchuāng yòushàng jiǎo de sān gè chuízhí diǎn yǐ kāiqǐ xuǎndān.
Jiāng huá shǔ xuán tíng zài chūxiàn de xuǎndān zhōng de “Chrome kuòchōng guǎnlǐ qì biāozhì” shàng.

Chákàn hé guǎnlǐ kuòchōng gōngnéng:

Zài `kuòchōng gōngnéng'biāoqiān zhōng, nín jiāng kàn dào yǐ ānzhuāng de suǒyǒu kuòchōng gōngnéng de qīngdān.
Nín kěyǐ tòuguò qiēhuàn fù dàng míng pángbiān de kāiguān lái qǐyòng huò tíng yòng kuòchōng gōngnéng. Zhànshí tíng yòng kuòchōng huì jiāng qí guānbì ér bù xièzài tā.
Ruò yào shānchú kuòchōng chéngxù, qǐng àn yīxià yào jiěchú ānzhuāng de kuòchōng gōngnéng xiàfāng de `shānchú'ànniǔ.


Chrome extension manager chrome://extensions/, main extension name, extension list, delete extension, edit

Here's how to access and use the Chrome extension manager:

Open Google Chrome: Launch the Google Chrome web browser on your computer.

Click on the three vertical dots in the top-right corner of the Chrome window to open the menu.
Hover your mouse over "Chrome Extension Manager logos" in the menu that appears.

View and Manage Extensions:

In the "Extensions" tab, you will see a list of all the extensions you have installed.
You can enable or disable an extension by toggling the switch next to its name. Disabling an extension temporarily turns it off without uninstalling it.
To remove an extension, click the "Remove" button under the extension you want to uninstall.
